alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 9:58AM PST until December 19 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MONDAY TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Shasta Valley in Siskiyou County, including Weed, Grenada, Montague, and portions of Interstate 5. * WHEN...From 10 AM Monday to 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects, and make driving difficult for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
